item.title: AI Chatbots Are About to Get a Huge Boost—From Libraries
item.description: Books and other documents from Harvard University and Boston’s public library could be a data bonanza for AI chatbots.

item.title: 3 Ways to Use Your Influence as an Asset
item.description: When leveraged as a strategic asset, influence can motivate and inspire your employees, clients, and investors.

item.title: Starbucks Invited 14,000 Employees to Las Vegas to See Something It’s Never Done Before. It Was a Brilliant Move
item.description: By putting their people first, Starbucks is making an investment that should pay off over time.

item.title: Trump Says the U.S. Trade Deal With China Is Done
item.description: The deal removes Chinese export restrictions on rare earths minerals and allows Chinese students access to U.S. universities.

item.title: How to Raise and Mentor Entrepreneurial Kids for Next-Generation Innovation
item.description: Parents, your greatest legacy could be instilling a sense of entrepreneurial thinking in your kids.
